data.title: Just Your Average Burget
data.text: I  think the word that describes Art's was "disappointing"  I think they probably have excellent reviews on the basis of their Breakfast Burrito which sounds like it's excellent. Unfortunately they only serve breakfast until 11AM.  The burger and fries (which Art's itself describes as "Just Like In-n-Out") are nothing like In-n-out.  They also charge a fee if you want to use a credit card so that's just another star off in my mind.

data.title: Baby in-n-out
data.text: They are good  burgers but not quite upto the in n out standard, they have specials twice a week where burgers are about 1.29 wednesday and sundays. They even have fries that are like animal style fries just with more ingredients like tomatoes and pickles. Overall ok but price is good. Reminds me of in n out style but not as good.

data.title: Fifty's type hamburger stand
data.text: I have been going to Art's hamburger stand for many years now and I am never disappointed with their food.  Their breakfast burritos are the bomb!  Very large and delicious...don't forget to ask them to add the salsa, very flavorful and not so spicy.  They have a drive up in-and-out service or you can sit out on a patio.  The staff are polite and courteous.  When in El Monte, Art's is a must.

data.title: Old Style Burger Stand
data.text: More choices than when it was an "In and Out".  Burgers still great. Two drive through lines.  Wednesday and Sunday specials.
